# lcod://tooling/value/clone@0.1.0

Deep clone a JSON value.

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `value` | any | No | Value to clone. |

## Outputs

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `value` | any | Independent copy of the provided value. |
